backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing user profiles, onboarding answers, reflection timestamps, and sentence history with access control. Includes functions for saving profiles, initializing onboarding, and logging daily reflections with capped history.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the AuthGate update to its source file, components, and requirement ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing frontend source files and their roles in authentication, onboarding, reflections, and UI structure.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, light/dark themes, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root app container and main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component handling authentication state, profile setup flow, and routing into the main experience.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Login screen showing app title, subtitle, and the single-line principle before triggering Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with app title, reset control, and sign‑out action that clears identity and cached queries.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple profile setup form that captures and saves the user’s name during first login.
frontend/src/features/daily/DailySurface: Daily view that renders empty space when not due or shows the explanation block when a reflection is required.
frontend/src/features/daily/ExplanationB: Displays generated explanation sentences and logs the uncushioned version when toggled.
frontend/src/features/MainExperience.tsx: Main router choosing between onboarding, weekly reflection, or daily surface based on backend state.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/Onboard: Four‑step onboarding form that collects answers sequentially and initializes onboarding on the final step.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/onboard: Defines the four onboarding questions and the step type used in the flow.
frontend/src/features/settings/ResetCont: Reset button with a simple confirmation flow that clears onboarding state.
frontend/src/features/weekly/WeeklyRefle: Displays the weekly reflection text generated from sentence history and logs the weekly reflection on mount.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout methods, and persists identities using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, onboarding data, reflections, and sentence history via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind-based styles, CSS variables, and theme definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/textConstraints.ts: Defines prohibited language checks and validation helpers to enforce text constraints on generated content.
frontend/src/lib/textSynthesis.ts: Generates explanation and reflection sentences based on onboarding answers and history, applying text validation rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across navigation and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, custom color tokens, extended theme settings, animations, and loads typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current feature set, schema version, and a detailed summary of the app’s purpose and behavior, including authentication, onboarding, roles, and constraints.
